Teaching methodology

A clear framework for controlled speaking improvement.

Core principles

Diagnose before practice

Identify recurring errors in grammar, pronunciation, and response structure first.

Train in real scenarios

Use interview, workplace, and IELTS speaking simulations instead of isolated drills.

Track and apply feedback

Convert corrections into clear next actions and measurable session targets.

Session flow

1

Baseline check

Capture a short sample to map strengths and high-impact gaps.

2

Guided practice

Complete controlled and open speaking tasks aligned to your goals.

3

Performance review

Review corrections, log progress, and set focused practice priorities.
